techmeme.title: Nintendo says Switch 2 pre-orders in Canada "will not start on April 9, 2025 in order to align with the timing of pre-orders to be determined in the US" (Bradly Shankar/MobileSyrup)
Sources: hackers intercepted ~100 bank regulators' emails, 150K+ in total, for over a year at the US Treasury's OCC, which disclosed a breach on February 26 (Bloomberg)
Sources: TSMC could face a $1B+ penalty to settle a US export control investigation over a chip it made that ended up inside Huawei's Ascend 910B chip (Karen Freifeld/Reuters)
Rain, which offers an employer-integrated personal finance and earned wage access app, raised a $75M Series B led by Prosus at a $340M post-money valuation (Jagmeet Singh/TechCrunch)
Emergency response drone maker Brinc announced $75M in funding led by Index Ventures, bringing total raised to $157.2M; Motorola will become Brinc's distributor (Todd Bishop/GeekWire)
